numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that the value below 50% is higher than the value at 50%.
2. I noticed that the value above 50% is higher than the value at 50%.
3. This means that middle-class people have a lower chance than upper-class people.
4. This means that middle-class people have a lower chance than lower-class people.
5. I wonder what the reason for this is.
6. I ask whether the generation of a family member matters.
7. This knowledge is important for me.
8. This knowledge is important when I apply to college.
